anammox.description: Hides various features related to nitro and the store

settings.emojiList: Remove unavailable categories from the emoji picker
settings.serverBoost: Remove server boost info above channel list

animalese.description: Plays animal crossing animalese for every message sent (they yap a lot)

settings.messageLengthLimit: Maximum length of message to process
settings.processOwnMessages: Enable to yap your own messages too

autoZipper.description: Automatically zips specified file types and folders before uploading to Discord

settings.extensions: Comma-separated list of file extensions to auto-zip (e.g., .psd,.blend,.exe,.dmg)

betterAudioPlayer.description: Adds a spectrograph and oscilloscope visualizer to audio attachment players

settings.forceMoveBelow: Force the visualizer below the audio player

toasts.invalidColor: Invalid color format for {settingKey}, make sure it's in the format 'R, G, B' or '#RRGGBB'

betterBanReasons.description: Create custom reasons to use in the Discord ban modal, and/or show a text input by default instead of the options.

settings.isTextInputDefault: Shows a text input instead of a select menu by default. (Equivalent to clicking the "Other" option)

betterBlockedUsers.description: Allows you to search in blocked users list and makes names selectable in settings.

refresh.failed: Failed to refresh commands. Check the console for details.
refresh.userOption: specific user to try and refresh

betterCommands.description: Enhances the command system with miscellaneous improvements.

settings.allowNewlinesInCommands: Allow newlines in command inputs (CTRL + Shift + Enter)
settings.autoFillArguments: Automatically fill command with all arguements instead of just required ones

betterInvites.description: See invites expiration date, view inviter profile and preview servers before joining by clicking the name

betterPlusReacts.description: The amount of plus before :emoji: is the message to add it to

betterUserArea.description: Customize and make the user area more clean.

settings.alwaysShowUsername: Always show username instead of status.
settings.removeAudioMenus: Remove menus next to mute and deafen buttons.

blockKeywords.description: Blocks messages containing specific user-defined keywords, as if the user sending them was blocked.

settings.blockedWords: Comma-seperated list of words to block
settings.caseSensitive: Whether to use a case sensitive search or not
settings.useRegex: Use each value as a regular expression when checking message content (advanced)

bypassPinPrompt.description: Bypass the pin prompt when using the pin functions

bypassStatus.description: Still get notifications from specific sources when in do not disturb mode. Right-click on users/channels/guilds to set them to bypass do not disturb mode.

settings.allowOutsideOfDms: Allow selected users to bypass status outside of DMs too (acts like a channel/guild bypass, but it's for all messages sent by the selected users)
settings.channels: Channels to let bypass (notified when pinged in that channel)
settings.guilds: Guilds to let bypass (notified when pinged anywhere in guild)
settings.notificationSound: Whether the notification sound should be played
settings.users: Users to let bypass (notified for all messages sent in DMs)

channelBadges.description: Adds badges to channels based on their type

settings.oneBadgePerChannel: Show only one badge per channel

tooltips.nsfwChannel: This channel is marked as NSFW.
tooltips.rulesChannel: This channel is the server rules channel.

channelTabs.description: Group your commonly visited channels in tabs, like a browser

characterCounter.description: Adds a character counter to the chat input

settings.colorEffects: Turn on or off color effects for getting close to the character limit

cleanChannelName.description: remove all emoji and decor shit from channel names

cleanerChannelGroups.description: Hides all channels in collapsed categories, even if they have unread messages.

clientSideBlock.description: Allows you to locally hide almost all content from any user

settings.blockedReplyDisplay: What should display instead of the message when someone replies to someone you have hidden

blockedReplyDisplayOptions.displayText: Display text saying a hidden message was replied to

settings.guildBlackList: Guild ids to disable functionality in
settings.guildWhiteList: Guild ids to enable functionality in
settings.hideBlockedMessages: Should messages from blocked users should be hidden fully (same as the old noblockedmessages plugin)
settings.hideBlockedUsers: Should blocked users should also be hidden everywhere
settings.hideEmptyRoles: Should role headers be hidden if all of their members are blocked
settings.hideVc: Hide voice channels containing blocked users.
settings.usersToBlock: User IDs seperated by a comma and a space

clipsEnhancements.description: Add more Clip FPS and duration options, custom clip length, RPC tagging and more

settings.clipsLink: Change FPS and duration options in Clips settings!
settings.ignorePlatformRestriction: Allow Platform Restricted Clipping (may cause save errors)
settings.richPresenceTagging: When should clips be tagged with the current Rich Presence?

richPresenceTaggingOptions.whenMatched: Only when beginning or end of activity name matches

commandPalette.description: Quickly run actions through a searchable command palette

settings.hotkey: Hotkey used to open the command palette

ui.hotkeyDescription: Hotkey used to open the command palette

components.description: Utility plugin for developers to test and preview Discord components

contentWarning.description: Allows you to specify certain trigger words that will be blurred by default. Hovering/Clicking on the blurred content will reveal it.

settings.onClick: Only show trigger content on click instead of hover

copyProfileColors.description: A plugin to copy people's profile gradient colors to clipboard.

copyStatusUrls.description: Copy the users status url when you right-click it

toast.error: Error copying URL, check console for more info

copyUserMention.description: Adds a button to copy user's mention on the user context menu, works best with ValidUser.

cursorBuddy.description: Adds a sprite that follows your cursor.

settings.fade: If the horse should fade when the cursor is near
settings.freeroam: If the horse should roam freely when idle
settings.shake: If the horse should shake the window when it's walking

customFolderIcons.description: Customize folder icons with any png

about.additional: Additionally you can use these in your inputs:
about.calendar: enables dynamic date formatting such as "Today" or "Yesterday".
about.relative: gives you times such as "4 hours ago".
about.title: How to use:

customTimestamps.description: Custom timestamps on messages and tooltips

settings.calendarFormatsDescription: How to format the [calendar] value if used in the above timestamps.

customUserColors.description: Lets you add a custom color to any user, anywhere! Highly recommend to use with typingTweaks and roleColorEverywhere

settings.colorInServers: If name colors should be changed within servers
settings.dmList: Users with custom colors defined will have their name in the dm list colored

disableCameras.description: Disables cameras in a call by default

discordDevBanner.description: Enables the Discord developer banner, in which displays the build-ID

dragFavoriteEmotes.description: Adds the ability to change the order of your favourite emotes

dragify.description: Drop users, channels, or servers into chat to insert mentions or invites.

settings.allowChatBodyDrop: Allow dropping into the main chat body to insert text.
settings.reuseExistingInvites: Reuse existing invite instead of creating a new one.

settings.showClasses: Display the element's CSS class names in the tooltip
settings.showDisplay: Display the element's display type along with flex or grid properties
settings.showFont: Display the computed font family and font size
settings.showId: Display the element's ID attribute in the tooltip
settings.showPosition: Display the element's CSS position type and z-index

alerts.supportWarningBody: Before asking for help. Check updates and if this issue is actually caused by Equicord!

settings.accountStandingButton: Show an account standing button in the header bar
settings.forceRoleIcon: Forces role icons to display next to messages in compact mode
settings.noDefaultHangStatus: Disable the default hang status when joining voice channels
settings.noMirroredCamera: Prevents the camera from being mirrored on your screen
settings.refreshSlashCommands: Refreshes Slash Commands to show newly added commands without restarting your client.
settings.removeActivitySection: Removes the activity section above member list
settings.showYourOwnActivityButtons: Discord hides your own activity buttons for some reason

equicordToolbox.description: Adds a button next to the inbox button in the channel header that houses Equicord quick actions

settings.showPluginMenu: Show the plugins menu in the toolbox

equissant.description: Crossant every specified amount of clicks :trolley:

settings.amount: Amount of clicks to trigger crossant

exitSounds.description: Play soundboard sounds when you disconnect from voice.

exportMessages.description: Allows you to export any message to a file

settings.exportContacts: Export a list of friends to your clipboard. Adds a new button to the menu bar for the friends tab.
settings.openFileAfterExport: Open the exported file in the default file handler after export

ui.contactListUndefined: Contact list is undefined. Click on the "All" tab before exporting.

fastDeleteChannels.description: Adds a trash icon to delete channels

settings.keyBind: The key to toggle trash when pressed.

fileUpload.description: Upload images and videos to file hosting services like Zipline and Nest

findReply.description: Jumps to the earliest reply to a message in a channel (lets you follow past conversations more easily).

settings.hideButtonIfNoReply: Hides the button if there are no replies to the message
settings.includeAuthor: Will also search for messages that reply to the author in general, not just that exact message
settings.includePings: Will also search for messages that @ the author directly

toasts.useBottomPanel: Use the bottom panel to navigate between replies.

fixFileExtensions.description: Fixes file extensions by renaming them to a compatible supported format if possible

followVoiceUser.description: Follow a friend in voice chat.
followVoiceUser.info: This Plugin is used to follow a Friend/Friends into voice chat(s).

settings.leaveWhenUserLeaves: Leave the voice channel when the user leaves. (That can cause you to sometimes enter infinite leave/join loop)
settings.onlyWhenInVoice: Only follow the user when you are in a voice channel

fontLoader.description: Loads any font from Google Fonts

settings.applyOnCodeBlocks: Apply the font to code blocks

ui.clickToApply: Click on any font to apply it.

settings.forwardPreface: What should forwarded from be prefaced with

settings.pingOwnerChance: If there should be a 1 in 10 change to ping the owner of the guild (oh no)

settings.showInMiniProfile: Show full ui in the mini profile instead of just a button
settings.showRepositoryTab: Show repositories tab in profile modal (hides button in connections when enabled)

globalBadges.description: Adds global badges from other client mods

googleThat.description: Adds a command to send a internet search link

settings.customEngineURL: The URL of the Engine you wish to use
settings.embed: If the sent link should render an embed
settings.hyperlink: If the sent link should hyperlink with the query as the label

guildPickerDumper.description: Context menu to dump and download a server's emojis and stickers.

guildTagSettings.description: Adds some settings for guild tags, such as hiding them or disabling the prompt to adopt them.

settings.disableAdoptTagPrompt: Disable the prompt to adopt tags

hideChatButtons.description: Able to hide the chat buttons

hideServers.description: Allows you to hide servers from the guild list and quick switcher by right clicking them

holyNotes.description: Save messages as notes to revisit later

homeTyping.description: Changes the home button to a typing indicator if someone in your dms is typing

hopOn.description: Hop on Fortnite or Hop on bloons :3

husk.description: Adds Husk button (check settings to change used emoji)

settings.findInServer: Attempt to find emoji of same name in server before using ID in settings (useful if no nitro)

iRememberYou.description: Locally saves everyone you've been communicating with (including servers), in case of lose

iconViewer.description: Adds a new tab to settings to preview all icons.

idleAutoRestart.description: Automatically restarts the client after being idle for a configurable amount of time, but avoids restarting while you are in VC.

settings.idleMinutes: Minutes of inactivity before restarting (when not in VC)

ignoreCalls.description: Allows you to ignore calls from specific users or dm groups.

settings.permanentlyIgnoredUsers: User IDs (comma + space) who should be permanetly ignored

commands.imgtogif: Allows you to turn an image to a gif

imgToGif.description: Adds a /imgtogif slash command to create a gif from any image

commands.inrole: Know who is in a role

inRole.description: Know who is in a role with the role context menu or /inrole command (read plugin info!)

errors.makeSureServer: Make sure that you are in a server.

limitations.description: If you don't have mod permissions on the server, and that server is large (over 100 members), the plugin may be limited in the following ways:
limitations.friendsAlwaysShown: However, friends will always be shown regardless of their status.
limitations.title: :warning: Limitations
limitations.upTo100: Up to 100 members will be listed by default. To get more, scroll down in the member list to load more members.

ingtoninator.description: Suffixes 'ington' to a random word in your message

settings.showIcon: Show a button to toggle the Ingtoninator plugin

instantScreenshare.description: Instantly screenshare when joining a voice channel with support for desktop sources, windows, and video input devices (cameras, capture cards)

info.soundPreviewInfo: We use the settings set and used by discord to decide if stream preview and sound should be enabled or not
info.videoDevicesInfo: Supports cameras and capture cards (like Elgato HD60X) when enabled in settings
info.wayland: For Wayland it only pops up the screenshare select
info.x11: For X11 it may or may not work :shrug:

invisibleChat.description: Encrypt your Messages in a non-suspicious way!

ui.hiddenMessageIndicator: This message has a hidden message! (InvisibleChat)

inviteDefaults.description: Allows you to edit the default values when creating server invites.

jellyfinRichPresence.description: Rich presence for Jellyfin media server

howToGetApiKey.description: Auth token can be found by following these steps:
howToGetApiKey.title: How to get an API key
howToGetApiKey.userIdInfo: You'll also need your User ID, which can be found in the url of your user profile page.

settings.apiKey: Jellyfin API key obtained from your Jellyfin administration dashboard
settings.coverType: Choose which cover to display when watching a TV show
settings.customName: Custom Rich Presence name (only used if 'Custom' is selected). Options: {name}, {series}, {season}, {episode}, {artist}, {album}, {year}
settings.nameDisplay: Choose how the application name should appear in Rich Presence
settings.privacyMode: Privacy Mode (Hide media details like Episode/Song Name)
settings.showEpisodeName: Show episode name after season/episode info
settings.showPausedState: Show Rich Presence when media is paused
settings.userId: Jellyfin user ID obtained from your user profile URL

jumpTo.description: Adds context menu options to jump to the start or bottom of a channel/DM.

errors.failedJump: Failed to jump to message. Check console for details.
errors.noMessagesFound: No messages found from this user in this channel.

jumpscare.description: Adds a configurable chance of jumpscaring you whenever you open a channel. Inspired by Geometry Dash Mega Hack

settings.audioSource: Sets the audio url of the jumpscare
settings.chance: The chance of a jumpscare happening (1 in X so: 100 = 1/100 or 1%, 50 = 1/50 or 2%, etc.)
settings.imageSource: Sets the image url of the jumpscare

keyboardNavigation.description: Allows you to navigate the UI with a keyboard.

settings.allowMouseControl: Allow the mouse to control the command palette.
settings.hotkey: The hotkey to open the command palette.

keyboardSounds.description: Adds OperaGX or osu! sound effects when typing on your keyboard.

keywordNotify.description: Sends a notification if a given message matches certain keywords or regexes

settings.amountToKeep: Amount of messages to keep in the log

lastActive.description: A plugin to jump to last active message from yourself or another user in a channel/server.

errors.findFailed: Failed to find messages. Check console for details.
errors.jumpFailed: Failed to jump to message. Check console for details.
errors.noRecentMessages: Couldn't find any recent messages from this user.

limitMiddleClickPaste.description: Prevent middle click pasting either always or just when a text area is not focused.

options.onlyWhenNotFocused: Only Prevent When Text Area Not Focused

settings.preventLinkOpen: Prevent middle-click on links from opening new tabs while preserving autoscroll.
settings.scope: Situations in which to prevent middle click from pasting.
settings.threshold: Milliseconds until pasting is enabled again after a middle click.

about.description: The MusicBrainz API does not require an API key, but it does require a meaningful user-agent string. For most, an email address should suffice.
about.title: About MusicBrainz API

listenBrainzRPC.description: Little plugin for ListenBrainz rich presence

nameFormatOptions.albumName: Use album name (falls back to custom status text if song has no album)

settings.hideWithActivity: Hide ListenBrainz presence if you have any other presence
settings.hideWithSpotify: Hide ListenBrainz presence if Spotify is running
settings.missingArt: When album or album art is missing
settings.nameFormat: Show name of song and artist in status name
settings.shareSong: Show link to song on ListenBrainz (may only be visible to other users)
settings.shareUsername: Show link to ListenBrainz profile (may only be visible to other users)
settings.useLogo: Show ListenBrainz logo on album art
settings.useTimeBar: Use track duration to display a time bar (must be using Listening status)

loginWithQR.description: Allows you to login to another device by scanning a login QR code, just like on mobile!

ui.enableAndRestart: Enable the plugin and restart your client to scan a login QR code

modal.importLogsTooltip: ML Enhanced now stores logs in indexeddb. You need to import your old logs from the logs directory. Importing wont overwrite existing logs

settings.alwaysLogCurrentChannel: Always log current selected channel. Blacklisted channels/users will still be ignored.
settings.attachmentFileExtensions: Comma separated list of file extensions to save. Attachments with file extensions not in this list will not be saved. Leave empty to save all attachments.
settings.attachmentSizeLimitInMegabytes: Maximum size of an attachment in megabytes to save. Attachments larger than this size will not be saved.
settings.blacklistedIds: Blacklisted server, channel, or user IDs.
settings.cacheLimit: Maximum number of messages to store in the cache. Older messages are deleted when the limit is reached. This helps reduce memory usage and improve performance. 0 means there is no limit
settings.cacheMessagesFromServers: Usually message logger only logs from whitelisted ids and dms, enabling this would mean it would log messages from all servers as well. Note that this may cause the cache to exceed its limit, resulting in some messages being missed. If you are in a lot of servers, this may significantly increase the chances of messages being logged, which can result in a large message record and the inclusion of irrelevant messages.
settings.hideMessageFromMessageLoggers: When enabled, a context menu button will be added to messages to allow you to delete messages without them being logged by other loggers. Might not be safe, use at your own risk.
settings.hideMessageFromMessageLoggersDeletedMess: The message content to replace the message with when using the hide message from message loggers feature.
settings.ignoreBots: Whether to ignore messages by bots
settings.ignoreMutedCategories: Messages in channels belonging to muted categories will not be logged. Whitelisted users/channels in muted guilds will still be logged.
settings.ignoreMutedChannels: Messages in muted channels will not be logged. Whitelisted users/channels in muted guilds will still be logged.
settings.ignoreMutedGuilds: Messages in muted guilds will not be logged. Whitelisted users/channels in muted guilds will still be logged.
settings.ignoreSelf: Whether to ignore messages by yourself
settings.ignoreWebhooks: Whether to ignore messages by webhooks
settings.messageLimit: Maximum number of messages to save. Older messages are deleted when the limit is reached. 0 means there is no limit
settings.messagesToDisplayAtOnceInLogs: Number of messages to display at once in logs & number of messages to load when loading more messages in logs.
settings.permanentlyRemoveLogByDefault: Vencord's base MessageLogger remove log button wiil delete logs permanently
settings.preserveCurrentChannel: When enabled, messages in your currently selected channel are not affected by time-based cleanup.
settings.saveMessages: Whether to save the deleted and edited messages.
settings.showLogsButton: Toggle to whenever show the toolbox or not
settings.showWhereMessageIsFrom: Show message channel/author name and server name
settings.timeBasedCleanupMinutes: Automatically remove messages from servers that are older than this many minutes. Set to 0 to disable time-based cleanup.
settings.whitelistedIds: Whitelisted server, channel, or user IDs.
